description: The PNEG_SURG_HX table contains pertinent negative surgical history data from history contacts entered in clinical system patient encounters. Since one patient encounter may contain multiple surgical history contacts, each contact is uniquely identified by a patient encounter serial number and a line number.

columns.name: PAT_ENC_CSN_ID
columns.description: The unique contact serial number for this contact. This number is unique across all patient encounters in your system. If you use IntraConnect this is the Unique Contact Identifier (UCI).

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line number for the information associated with this contact. Multiple pieces of information can be associated with this contact.

columns.name: PNEG_SURG_HX_ID
columns.description: The entry date for a patient's pertinent negative surgical history

columns.name: PNEG_SURG_HX_DT
columns.description: The entry date for a patient's pertinent negative surgical history for a procedure.

columns.name: PNEG_SURG_HX_CMT
columns.description: Free text comments entered for the patient's pertinent negative surgical history.

columns.name: PNEG_SURG_HX_SRC_C_NAME
columns.description:
The category number for the source of entry for the surgical history. Category table information for this item is stored in the Clarity table ZC_HISTORY_SOURCE.


May contain organization-specific values: Yes


 Category Entries: 


Provider


Patient


Parent


Legal Guardian


Proxy User
